channel.title: Redux on Dzintars Klavins

item.title: SPA Front page application
item.description: About the Project It’s a SPA-style web application based on a bunch of buzzword technologies, most importantly Web Components. The idea behind choosing web components was to accumulate a bunch of reusable components that would be framework-agnostic over time. At the time of creating the project, React was the only framework that didn’t support web components, but times might have changed since then. TODO: Add some images TIL (Today I Learned) Redux features: Thinking in terms of “features” helped me come up with a better code structure.
